short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the art print options with custom banner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rage Against the Archive is a New Media Art in the form of Chrome extension that works on New York Public Library's digital archives and replaces the "Order Selected Image As" options with an error message in a symbolic act of Electronic Civil Disobedience
